Ramen w/ SPAM, Egg(s), & Toppings

Ingredients

  1. 3 oz. Package of Ramen Noodles, any Flavor
  2. 4 oz. SPAM (Classic, Less Sodium, or Lite)
  3. 1-2 Eggs, based on preference
  4. 1 tbs. Chopped Green Onions
  5. Sriracha Sauce to preference
  6. Chili Powder to preference

Instructions

  1. Begin cooking your egg(s) to preference. Soft-boiled works best in my opinion, but regardless of how you prefer them, begin cooking the egg before your ramen so that they can be finished at a closer time.
  2. In a medium saucepan, boil 2 cups of water for the ramen. Drop ramen block inside once water has reached a rolling boil. If you would like a simple way to heat the SPAM, throw it into the saucepan as well.
  3. Cook for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Make sure to check on egg(s) as well to avoid overcooking.
  4. After 3 minutes of boiling, turn off heat. Stir in the seasoning packet that came with the ramen,
  5. Fill
  6. Fill
  7. Fill
  8. Fill
  9. Fill
  10. Fill
  11. Fill
  12. Fill
